description: Expand your comfort zone with this uber-plush lounge hoodie. Made with a cotton/modal baby French terry that's peached for extra softness, home is where 3Six Five is. Designed using a breathable, odor-resistant, and moisture wicking fabric, this laid-back style with have you looking and feeling fresh -- from checking off a to-watch list at home, to checking off a shopping list at the grocery store. Pair with the 3SixFive bottoms, and truly experience comfort from the top of your head to the tip of your toes.
name: Saxx Underwear 3Six Five Hoodie - Mens
